name: 4 Pics 1 Footballer
description:
This is the quiz "4 Pics 1 Footballer!" And it was created especially for you, if you are a real fan of football, who does not miss any important match, at any time is ready to explain the rules and nuances of the game, remember by heart who Beckham, Maradona, Ronaldo, Kaka, Messi, and for which teams they were playing!
And can you guess which footballer is covered for 4 different photos that characterize a specific Iroka? This game will make you move your brains and dig into your memory!
We collected a lot of players!
How many levels of 200 will you have enough? Check your wit and memory!

FEATURES:

-Over 200 levels!

-Name Footballer!

-Hint coins for when you get stuck!

-Play daily to receive hint coins!

-Levels with Footballer from various different!

-Challenge your friends to see who knows the most Footballer or ask them for help if
you get stuck on a level.
